com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions

Interface ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DashRendererBuilder, ExtractorRendererBuilder, HlsRendererBuilder
    Enclosing class:
    ExoplayerWrapper

    public static interface ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder
    Builds renderers for the player.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildRenderers(ExoplayerWrapper player)
      Constructs the necessary components for playback.
      void cancel()
      Cancels the current build operation, if there is one.

    • Method Detail

      • buildRenderers

        void buildRenderers(ExoplayerWrapper player)
        Constructs the necessary components for playback.
        Parameters:
        player - The parent player.

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Cancels the current build operation, if there is one. Else does nothing.
